function that creates a list of the diﬀerent combinations of parameters to try. We will deﬁne
a small subset of conﬁgurations to try as an example, including a diﬀerencing of 12 months,
which we expect will be required. You are encouraged to experiment with standalone models,
review learning curve diagnostic plots, and use information about the domain to set ranges of
values of the hyperparameters to grid search.
